title: Full Stack Software Engineer – Early Stage Startup
description:
At TrakTax, we’re building tools at the intersection of finance and technology to simplify how individuals and professionals engage with financial products.

What you’ll do
• Build high-quality mobile features in Flutter (navigation, forms, uploads, notifications).
• Design and ship secure REST/GraphQL APIs in Node.js/Express or NestJS.
• Model and query data in Postgres/MySQL.
• Implement authentication, state management, and offline-friendly UX.
• Collaborate with design to ship clean, accessible UI.

What we’re looking for
• 3+ years building production apps.
• Strong Flutter (Bloc/Riverpod/Provider), API integration, and testing.
• Solid Node.js (Express/NestJS), database design, and CI/CD pipelines.
• Bonus: file uploads, chat/real-time, push notifications, or payments.

Why join us
• Early, high-ownership role with real product impact.
• Small, fast team; flexible/remote-friendly.
• Opportunity to shape architecture and practices from day one.

Compensation
• ₹100,000-₹130,000 per month, depending on experience
• In person
• Potential ESOPs for early team members

Apply or DM me with your portfolio/GitHub.
